headline: How Investors Are Reacting To ON Semiconductor (ON) Massive New Buyback And Analyst Reaffirmations
summary: In recent weeks, ON Semiconductor has drawn attention as multiple banks reaffirmed their coverage while the company’s board authorized a US$6.00 billion share repurchase program over three years, underscoring its focus on capital returns alongside investments in power and sensing technologies. This combination of renewed analyst focus and a very large buyback authorization highlights how management is positioning ON Semiconductor around growth areas such as automotive, industrial automation,...
